MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the G65 postcode area of Glasgow is still ongoing. This is due to a grounded overhead line located during repair work and we now expect power to be back on by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.38pm on 15th April 2021.
